game.name: Police Driver
game.description:
Oh my God! We can bet that you have never imagined that driving a car in a tricky environment can be so entertaining and thrilling! Choose a track, car and get ready to drive, win races and prove the world that you are the ultimate driver of this planet in this brand new racing game! Wow! The multiple police cars are waiting for you to drive in Police Driver. Practice your stunning stunts and challenge your insane driving abilities to make win each time!

You cannot avoid this job as you have taken the responsibility of fighting against crime and chasing dangerous criminals. Grab your car, tighten your seatbelt and be prepared to show-off of your best moves! Perform as many stunts as you can in different areas to complete your task as a professional cop! Use your brain to traverse on different terrains. Choose any of the 4 locations including desert, countryside, highway, and big city!

Drive your chosen vehicle at the highest speed and use the stunt ramps perfectly to score points in this HTML5 car game! There are multiple platforms around to play through. Score and earn points to buy other new vehicles as you would have 10 different cars to use! Do not take your hands off the steering wheel until you achieve your goal. Give this cool police car game a try for sure if you really want to experience what it requires to be a cop!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,,S,D ARROWS TO DRIVE, SPACE TO BREAK,C CHANGE THE VIEW, R TO RESET THE VIEW,SHIFT TO BOOST,E TO TURN POLICE LIGHT,X TO HIDE INSTRUCTION, 1,2,3 TO CHANGE THE CAR,TAB TO EXIT
